element.name: Knockree Geocache by JustyDawson, Traditional Cache (2/3)
element.description: Hidden Along the Wicklow Way near Knockree Youth Hostel.
element.long-description:
Knockree is situated in a wonderful tranquil position, right on the Wicklow Way and commands superb views of Glencree and the mountains that ring it.
Enniskerry, is 7 kilometres from the Knockree, is one of the prettiest villages in Ireland, lying in a wooded hollow among the hills west of Bray. Nearby are Powerscourt demesne and the Glen of the Dargle.
The cache was hidden by the Troop 44 Scouts along the Wicklow Way. Enjoy the beauty as you walk alongside the River Dargle and try and find our cache location.
The cache is an ammo box which could be hidden in several locations. After you find where we have hidden it, please take your time to try and disguise it in the same fashion!
For tourists to Ireland, this is an ideal cache if you are staying in Knockree Hostel. It is litterally 10 minutes walk away!
If you are continuing the Wicklow Way, dont forget to check out the Paddock Hill Cache, another one of my caches!
element.encoded-hints: If you have a good GPS, you wont need a hint for this one. Its a regular size cache inside!

ul.li:
2010-06-01T19:00:00Z : Found it by Frigo
Found it on a hike along this magic natureside - wow !!! This river and the small Beach nearby was so beautyful.
Thanks for a cache at this route.
Greetings Frigo
(Rated 4 stars with [url=http://www.gcvote.com]GCVote[/url])

2010-03-13T20:00:00Z : Found it by Spark_ie
Found along my 42km hike of the Wicklow Way today, absolutely beautiful location, thought the moss covered stones at the riverside were magical ! Great cache, and a great hide [:D] Well done !! [:)] Dropped a geocoin and took 3 TB's (Which haven't been logged in yet) TFTC !! Spark_ie [:D]

2010-03-11T20:00:00Z : Found it by kmc1112
Visiting Ireland over spring break from Virginia, USA. Walking the Wicklow way from Knockree Hill to Lough Tay with my Eagle Scouts today. Enjoyed the scenery on a beautiful sunny late winter day. Came upon some deer as we approached GZ. Took Lucky Leprechaun geocoin, Left DC pin and racecar. TFTC.

2010-03-04T20:00:00Z : Found it by The Fat Cats
Our last day in Ireland, we planned on visiting Powerscourt Waterfall to start our day, but we arrived too early. Then we saw this cache listed not too far off, so we headed over. So glad we did! We really enjoyed the walk down and the interesting flora! Thanks for much for showing us this cool spot! :grin:
Took a TB to move along, dropped off a geocoin and some TBs

2010-03-04T20:00:00Z : Found it by Team sparksNsmalls
Found this one while killing some time before the Powerscort Waterfall opened. We really enjoyed the scenery while on the hunt. TFTC
